CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( uNI_IsUserActionOwner__c, uNI_IsUserSecondaryOwner__c, uNI_IsUserThirdActionOwner__c ), uNI_CurrentPendingTask__c & BR() & uNI_SecondaryCurrentPendingTask__c & BR() & uNI_ThirdCurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( AND(uNI_IsUserActionOwner__c, uNI_IsUserSecondaryOwner__c), uNI_CurrentPendingTask__c & BR() & uNI_SecondaryCurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( AND(uNI_IsUserActionOwner__c, uNI_IsUserThirdActionOwner__c), uNI_CurrentPendingTask__c & BR() & uNI_ThirdCurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( AND(uNI_IsUserSecondaryOwner__c, uNI_IsUserThirdActionOwner__c), uNI_SecondaryCurrentPendingTask__c & BR() & uNI_ThirdCurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( uNI_IsUserActionOwner__c, uNI_CurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( uNI_IsUserSecondaryOwner__c, uNI_SecondaryCurrentPendingTask__c,
IF( uNI_IsUserThirdActionOwner__c, uNI_ThirdCurrentPendingTask__c, "" ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Current Action Owner Task
